name: Flappy Bird (itch) (Melvin Ng)
description:
**How to Play**

1) Press the Spacebar or Click your mouse to fly (Desktop)

2) Tap your screen to fly (Mobile)

3) Avoid the pipes & the ground

The game ends when you hit the pipes or hit the ground. To play again, click the 'Restart' button on the Game Over screen.

Game created using Scratch programming language & open source free art & music assets.
